Author: Author
SendHeadingText: Choose how you want to send your message
SendToGeneralChannel: Send to the General channel of specific teams
SentToGeneralChannel: Sent to the General channel of the following teams
SendToRosters: Send in chat to members of the following teams
SentToRosters: Sent in chat to people in teams
SendToGroups: Send in chat to members of the following M365 groups, Distribution groups or Security groups
SendToGroupsPlaceHolder: Type the name or email address of the group(s)
SendToGroupsNote: Note: This option sends the message to all the members of the group who have access to the User app.
SendToGroupsPermissionNote: Permissions needed. Ask your IT admin to enable this option for you.
SentToGroups1: Sent in chat to members of the following groups
SentToGroups2: M365 groups, Distribution groups or Security groups
SendToAllUsersNote: Note: This option sends the message to all the users in the organization who have access to the User app.
UnauthorizedErrorMessage: Sorry, an error occurred while trying to access this service.
ForbiddenErrorMessage: Sorry, you do not have permission to access this page. Please contact your administrator to be granted permission.
GeneralErrorMessage: Oops! An unexpected error seems to have occurred. Why not try refreshing your page? Or you can contact your administrator if the problem persists.
ExportQueueSuccessMessage1: You'll be notified in chat when your file is ready to download.
ExportQueueSuccessMessage2: Note: You will first get a chat message asking you to give this app permission to upload to your OneDrive.
ExportErrorMessage: Try exporting the results again. If the problem persists, contact your IT admin for help.
ErrorImageSizeMessage: Maximum allowed size of image via upload is ~1 MB.
ImageSizeInfoContent: Maximum allowed size of image via upload is ~1 MB. It's recommended to use image upload functionality for smaller size images.
UploadImageInfo: Upload an image of type jpeg, jpg, png or gif.
UploadImageSuccessful: You can re-upload an image of type jpeg, jpg, png or gif.
draftMessagesGridNavigation: Draft messages table with grid keyboard navigation
sentMessagesGridNavigation: Sent messages table with grid keyboard navigation
deletedMessagesGridNavigation: Deleted messages table with grid keyboard navigation
enterValidURL: Please enter a valid https URL
chooseRangeOfDeleteMessagesTitle: Choose a range of messages to delete
deleteConfirmationNote: Note: You will not be able to retrieve messages once deleted
previewMessageConfirmation: Preview message has been sent successfully in this channel.
ScheduleSection: Select a date and time to schedule your message.
ScheduleNote: Note: Schedule at least 30 Minutes in the future.
ScheduleTimeValidation: Scheduled time is less than 30 Minutes.
DeletingMessagesLabel: Cleanup operation has started and will run in the background. You can track the status in the summary grid.
CustomInvalidDateRange: Please select a date range of maximum 6 months.
CustomDeleteInfoContent: A maximum date range of 6 months is allowed for message deletion.
